name: GOLD MEDALIST
description:
Challenge 192 athletes from 8 countries, in 9 sporting events such as discus throw, high jump, boxing, and swimming to become the Gold Medalist at the 1988 Seoul Olympics! Can you defeat Louis or Ben?

* 2P gameplay / ad-hoc functionality is not available for this software
